title: A short story on success.

sentences.21f5: One day, a young guy was on an elevator. The elevator stopped at another floor, and another person then got on.

sentences.c108: That other person… was Richard Branson.

sentences.2594: But the young guy didn’t recognize him.

sentences.a540: Branson said, “Hello.” The young guy replied, “I’m sorry, but I think I’m in the wrong elevator. Also, pleasure to meet you.” Branson then looked right in the guy’s eyes and said, “No… you are exactly where you need to be. My name is Richard Branson.”

sentences.f86f: And then the elevator let the two off… at the top floor.

sentences.1e12: Who’s the young guy in this story? Here’s the thing: it’s not even a guy at all. In fact, he is the abstract concept… of YOUR POTENTIAL.

sentences.e455: For more “inspiration,” follow me on Medium and Twitter.

content: A short story on success. One day, a young guy was on an elevator. The elevator stopped at another floor, and another person then got on. That other person… was Richard Branson. But the young guy didn’t recognize him. Branson said, “Hello.” The young guy replied, “I’m sorry, but I think I’m in the wrong elevator. Also, pleasure to meet you.” Branson then looked right in the guy’s eyes and said, “No… you are exactly where you need to be. My name is Richard Branson.” And then the elevator let the two off… at the top floor. Who’s the young guy in this story? Here’s the thing: it’s not even a guy at all. In fact, he is the abstract concept… of YOUR POTENTIAL. Just something to think about. For more “inspiration,” follow me on Medium and Twitter.
